products.title: Harper, Burnt Orange - Roman Blind
products.description: This beautiful array of shades is the perfect tonic if you're shopping for some vibrant and zesty roman blinds that will bring your interior to life. A welcome sense of calm is introduced by the shades of grey and light blue that really help set the tone. The living room will transform itself into the heart of the home when you pair this offering from the harper range with some light blue walls and a selection of orange and yellow accessories.

products.title: Harper Orange
products.description: Min width: 300mm max width: 1350mm (with join 2500mm) min drop: 400mm max drop: 2500mm fabric composition: 62% polyester 38% cotton guarantee: 12 months controls: sidewinder control. Fabric lining: ivory poly cotton lining as standard, white blackout lining and interlining available. Fixings: fixing brackets included. Headrail: robust aluminium headrail, 30mm wide x 43mm deep. Finish: fabric attached to headrail with velcro.
